nodes.text: The Alfestril system was a star system located within the Inner Rim region of the galaxy.

During the Galactic Civil War, Imperial Captain Nevik suspected that Rebel Alliance undercover agents were working in the Alfestril system. His crew aboard the Devastator had discovered this information in a coded transmission between Central Commander Sollaine of the Imperial Security Bureau and Darth Vader. Although Nevik attempted to investigate, Commander Sollaine executed the captain when he refused an order to travel to Corulag.
